original: @114a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @114a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: badzra b'a r'a h'i sam kshi bta sto tra /
analyzed: badzra b'a r'a h'i sam kshi bta sto tra /
translated: Vajravārāhīsaṃkṣiptasthotra

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: rdo rje phag mo'i mdor bsdus pa'i bstod pa /
analyzed: rdo rje phag mo'i mdor bsdus pa'i bstod pa /
translated: Praise in Summary of Vajravārāhī

original: rje btsun ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: rje btsun ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the venerable Tārā!

original: mkha' 'gro bye ba'i gtso mo ste //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro bye ba'i gtso mo ste //
translated: The chief of ten million ḍākinīs,

original: nyi ma bye ba'i 'od mnga' zhing //
analyzed: nyi ma bye ba'i 'od mnga' zhing //
translated: possessing the light of ten million suns,

original: thod pa lcags kyu gri gug gis //
analyzed: thod pa lcags kyu gri gug gis //
translated: with a skull cup, iron hook, and flaying knife,

original: g-yas pa'i phyag rnams rnam par brgyan //
analyzed: g-yas pa'i phyag rnams rnam par brgyan //
translated: adorning the right hands.

original: kha tv'am zhags pas mgo bo ni ;
analyzed: kha tv'am zhags pas mgo bo ni ;
translated: The khaṭvāṅga and noose

original: / g-yon pa'i phyag tu rab tu grags //
analyzed: / g-yon pa'i phyag tu rab tu grags //
translated: are well known in the left hands.

original: dus kyi mtshan mo mnyam mnan cing //
analyzed: dus kyi mtshan mo mnyam mnan cing //
translated: Embracing Kālarātri,

original: gar thabs kyis ni nye bar brgyan //
analyzed: gar thabs kyis ni nye bar brgyan //
translated: adorned with the dance posture,

original: mche ba cung zad rnam gtsigs shing //
analyzed: mche ba cung zad rnam gtsigs shing //
translated: slightly baring the fangs,

original: dz'a ba'i me tog lta bur dmar //
analyzed: dz'a ba'i me tog lta bur dmar //
translated: red like a japā flower,

original: gshin rje brtan sogs rnal 'byor ma //
analyzed: gshin rje brtan sogs rnal 'byor ma //
translated: the yoginīs such as Dṛḍha-Yama,

original: padma'i 'dab mar gnas pas brgyun //
analyzed: padma'i 'dab mar gnas pas brgyun //
translated: continuously abiding on lotus petals,

original: rdo rje phreng ba'i nang du ni //
analyzed: rdo rje phreng ba'i nang du ni //
translated: within the vajra garland,

original: dur khrod brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan //
analyzed: dur khrod brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan //
translated: adorned with the eight charnel grounds,

original: lha rdzas bde ba myong ba yi //
analyzed: lha rdzas bde ba myong ba yi //
translated: experiencing divine bliss,

original: 'jig rten skyong rnams phyag kyang 'tshal //
analyzed: 'jig rten skyong rnams phyag kyang 'tshal //
translated: The guardians of the world also pay homage.

original: gzhan yang bran pho bran mo rnams //
analyzed: gzhan yang bran pho bran mo rnams //
translated: Moreover, the male and female servants

original: thal mo sbyar ba byas nas gnas //
analyzed: thal mo sbyar ba byas nas gnas //
translated: Remain with palms joined in supplication.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi yum 'di ni //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi yum 'di ni //
translated: This mother of all buddhas

original: rdzu 'phrul dngos grub mchog rnams stsol //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul dngos grub mchog rnams stsol //
translated: Bestows the supreme siddhi of miraculous powers.

original: lha la sogs pa thar don du //
analyzed: lha la sogs pa thar don du //
translated: For the sake of liberation of gods and so forth,

original: khyod nyid la ni skyabs su mchi //
analyzed: khyod nyid la ni skyabs su mchi //
translated: I go for refuge to you.

original: snying rje khu ba'i sems kyis ni //
analyzed: snying rje khu ba'i sems kyis ni //
translated: With a mind of compassionate fluid,

original: lha yi spyan gyis rnam gzigs nas //
analyzed: lha yi spyan gyis rnam gzigs nas //
translated: Gazing with divine eyes,

original: de la mchog gi gsol don du //
analyzed: de la mchog gi gsol don du //
translated: For the sake of the supreme request,

original: phyogs rnams su ni rnams bzhugs shing //🔽blo chen ldan pa'i grub pa po //
analyzed: phyogs rnams su ni rnams bzhugs shing // blo chen ldan pa'i grub pa po //
translated: Residing in the directions,🔽The one who knows who possesses

original: dngos grub snod ni su gnas shes //
analyzed: dngos grub snod ni su gnas shes //
translated: The vessel of siddhi,

original: mkha' 'gro ma sogs lhan cig tu //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma sogs lhan cig tu //
translated: Together with the ḍākinīs and so forth,

original: phyag rgya'i dngos grub stsol mdzad pa //
analyzed: phyag rgya'i dngos grub stsol mdzad pa //
translated: Bestows the siddhi of the consort.

original: rdo rje phag mo phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: rdo rje phag mo phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I pay homage and praise Vajravārāhī.

original: lha mo'i yon tan rgya mtsho ni //
analyzed: lha mo'i yon tan rgya mtsho ni //
translated: The ocean of qualities of the goddess

original: bskal pa bye bar brjod mi nus //
analyzed: bskal pa bye bar brjod mi nus //
translated: Cannot be expressed in a million eons.🔽Having summarized, I have definitely composed

original: mdor bsdus nas ni cung zad cig / bdag gi dad pas nges par byas //
analyzed: mdor bsdus nas ni cung zad cig / bdag gi dad pas nges par byas //
translated: A little bit out of faith.

original: byang chub snying po'i bar du ni //
analyzed: byang chub snying po'i bar du ni //
translated: Until I reach the essence of enlightenment,

original: bdag ni rtag tu skyabs su mchi //
analyzed: bdag ni rtag tu skyabs su mchi //
translated: I always go for refuge.

original: bdag dang sems can bsod nams des //
analyzed: bdag dang sems can bsod nams des //
translated: By that merit of myself and others,🔽May the supreme attainment be granted.

original: dngos grub dam pa stsol bar shog / rdo rje phag mo'i mdor bsdus pa'i bstod pa aa bhi sang ka tas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: dngos grub dam pa stsol bar shog / rdo rje phag mo'i mdor bsdus pa'i bstod pa aa bhi sang ka tas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: The praise in brief of Vajravarahi composed by Abhisangika is complete.

original: // / pandi ta ngag gi dbang phyug dang / klog @114b skya lo ts'a bas bsgyur ba'o//
analyzed: // / pandi ta ngag gi dbang phyug dang / klog @114b skya lo ts'a bas bsgyur ba'o//
translated: Translated by the pandit Vagishvara and the editor Lotsawa.
